channel.title: Mod/admin tools
channel.description:
I think this is really harcoding (it is for me) [DELTA]
I have created a Mod/Admin tool with buttons like banuser kickuser warnuser update server ect. i have some difficulties with the banuser kickuser thing... because i want if i click on the button (actionbuttons.java) it opens a form where i can type in a name and if i click ok he will be immedialtly banned..
Can someone help me with this?
